summary: Airbnb is an American online platform that lets people rent out their homes or find places to stay temporarily. It was created in 2008 by three friends, Brian, Nathan, and Joe. When you book a place on Airbnb, the company takes a small fee. It's like a middleman, making it easy to find unique places to stay all over the world. Airbnb is super popular and is often the first choice for people looking for short-term rentals.
title: Airbnb
